review: Took a bit to get it set up due to being unable to connect to Roku via wifi.  However, Roku customer service tried valiantly to assist, for hours.  Finally, it just did what it was supposed to and things have gone smoothly since.  This is an upgrade from an earlier Roku.  I like the convenience of the stick, and not having electrical components all over.  We do not have cable, use it exclusively for Netflix, Hulu, YouTube, etc.  Very pleased with this purchase.

review: Initially, I had trouble setting up the device, the screen for entering my router's username and password was wider than my TV's screen and couldn't be resized or scrolled. But after an online text chat with a Roku tech support person the problem was corrected and the device works properly now.
